location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 6/6 II Pension contribution of late Subedar Niaz Ali Khan'

physicalDescription.extent: The file is arranged chronologically from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the main foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 24; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel between ff 4-23; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled.

mods.abstract: The file consists of correspondence relating to the pension contributions of murdered Subedar, Niaz Ali Khan of the Bahrain Levy Corps, and its payment to his widow. The correspondence is between the Political Agency in Bahrain, Political Residency in the Persian Gulf, and the Adviser to the Government of Bahrain.
